name: Inkura
description:
An endless, one-button shooter! 

This game was made as part of my education in game design. Every asset (except the ink blob enemies) are made by me. 

Controls:
Mouse: Aim
Left Click: Shoot projectiles

Shooting projectiles uses stamina; stamina recovers over time. The player's color turns blue when they are at full stamina. Projectiles shot will first travel towards, then away from the cursor.  

The game lasts about a minute, with enemy spawns increasing over time until hordes of enemies come after you.
